landing.descriptions: Passionate software engineer specializing in Angular front-end development, with advanced expertise in full-stack solutions.

experience.title: My Journey
experience.summary: From crafting sleek front-end experiences in Angular to mastering scalable backend architectures with Spring Boot and Express.js, I've built a robust toolkit as a full-stack developer. Previously, I delved into Flutter development and shared my knowledge as a programming instructor, guiding the next generation of developers.
